import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Testimonials from "./Testimonials"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { getProduct } from "../store/ActionCreators/ProductActionCreator"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); let dispatch = useDispatch(); let ProductStateData = useSelector((state) => state.ProductStateData); function getApiData() { dispatch(getProduct()); if (ProductStateData.length) { setData(ProductStateData.slice(1).reverse().slice(0, 8)); } } useEffect(() => { getApiData(); }, [ProductStateData.length]); console.log(ProductStateData); return ( <> {/* */}
